text.headline:
World War II
1939 - 1945
text.text: World War II was the deadliest war in history resulting in the loss of over 60 million lives. This timeline will outline the most important events.

text.headline: Germany invades Poland
text.text: On September 1st of 1939, Germany invades Poland, prompting the United Kingdom and France to declare war with Germany 2 days later on September 3rd when their ultimatum was ignored requesting Germany to cease military operations.

text.headline: The Soviet Union signs a ceasefire with Japan
text.text: On September 15th, Russia signs a ceasefire with Japan after the Battle of Kahlkhin Gol ended in Japans defeat.

text.headline: The Soviet Union invades Poland
text.text: On September 17th, The Soviet Union invades Poland from the east creating a war on two fronts, Poland is outmatched.
